function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risky working conditions in construction sites","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation and worker health issues","Mitigation":"Implementing strict safety protocols, providing personal protective equipment, and regular site inspections","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM) for safety planning, IoT sensors for monitoring worker health and environmental conditions","People":"Construction workers, site managers, and laborers","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Unemployment and reduced availability of workers","Impact":"Increased pressure on existing workers, potential overworking, and increased risk of contagion due to a smaller workforce","Mitigation":"Investing in workforce management, training programs, and providing support for mental health and well-being","Technologies":"Digital workforce management systems, virtual training platforms, mental health apps","People":"Construction workers, laborers, and project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, human resources departments, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of communication and information on safety rules and laws","Impact":"Higher likelihood of non-compliance with safety measures, increased risk of contagion, and compromised worker safety","Mitigation":"Implementing clear communication channels, training programs, and knowledge sharing platforms","Technologies":"Communication apps, cloud-based document management systems, training and certification platforms","People":"Construction workers, safety officers, and site supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, safety officers, regulatory bodies"}]}
